thig5.2:1.4: I despised anyone who was not my equal.
thig5.2:2.3: I stood at the entrance of the pleasure house,
thig5.2:3.2: and often exposed my private parts;
thig5.2:3.3: I made fun of many people,
thig5.2:3.4: and deceived them in many ways.
thig5.2:4.2: with a shaven-head, wrapped in a robe.
thig5.2:4.3: Seated at the root of a tree,
thig5.2:5.1: All bonds have been cut off,
thig5.2:5.4: I have become cool and quenched.”
thig5.2:6.1: The Elder Vimalā, a Former Courtesan.
